import React from 'react' import Product from '../components/Product' import data from '../data' export default function ProductScreen() { const product = data.product.find((x) =>x._id=== props.matach.params.id) if (!product){ return
Product Not Found
} return (

  • {product.image}

  • Price : {product.price}
  • Price : {product.price}
) }
